department.dept_long_name: Department of Slavic Languages and Literatures

course.title: Tutorial - Junior Year
course.faculty_text: Maria Khotimsky (spring term) and William Mills Todd III (fall term)
course.description: Fall term introduces students to Gogol's short fiction, read in the original, and explores a range of interpretive approaches. Spring term is devoted to a single topic and provides concentrators with a more intensive reading experience. This year's focus is on the life and short fiction and plays, read in the original, of Anton Pavlovich Chekhov.
course.notes: Required of junior concentrators in Slavic Literatures and Cultures. Other students may enroll for one or both terms. Students who wish to concentrate on a different Slavic language may arrange a separate tutorial.
